name: .K2S File Extension
summary: Learn about .K2S files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Saved game created by Kaiser II, a nation building and foreign policy game based on the original Amiga game; saves the player progress including economic activity and international policy decisions.

content: NOTE: Kaiser II is localized in German. K2S files are called "Spielstand" files, which stands for "score" or "saved game."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
